title: What is the interpretation of seeing President Sisi in a dream and what does it mean?

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing President Sisi in a dream: The President of the State manages the affairs of the state, taking into account the interests of citizens, ruling among them fairly, and meeting all their demands to provide them with a decent living. Seeing President Sisi in a dream Seeing a person in a dream with President Sisi is a vision that shows the dreamer’s high status and position. High status among his family members and friends. If one sees in his dream that Sisi is giving him a gift, then seeing him promises that he will receive a lot of livelihood from a lawful source. If one sees in his dream that Sisi is visiting him at his workplace, it means that he will make profits and get a promotion in Work. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian dream interpretation website by Google. Interpretation of a dream about President Sisi in a single woman’s dreamIf an unmarried girl sees President Sisi in her dream, this is a good omen for her to excel and succeed in her studies. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream about Sisi A vision foretells good news that she will hear soon. President Sisi in an unmarried girl’s dream is a vision that indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of kindness and sustenance in her life. If a girl dreams that she is shaking hands with Sisi, this is good news for her that she will get a lot of money and profits as a result. Her work is in trade. Interpretation of a dream about President Sisi in a dream for a married woman. President Sisi visiting a married woman in a dream is a vision that indicates the woman’s tendency toward problems and disagreements between her and her husband. For a married woman to see in a dream that Sisi meets her husband and presents him with a certificate, this indicates the high status of her husband. And his high social status. Seeing President Sisi in a dream about a man. If one sees in a dream that President Sisi is visiting him at his home, then this vision is good news for the dreamer of comfort, the removal of worries and sorrows, and the abundance of his livelihood. Seeing a man in a dream meeting Sisi, greeting him, and receiving him, this was evidence that The dreamer will receive a benefit that will change the course of his life for the better. If a man dreams that Sisi is eating with him, this indicates the dreamer’s high status.

title: Interpretation of sleep in a dream Seeing someone sleeping in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone sleeping in a dream and falling into a deep sleep, laughing or snoring on the bed or on the floor, whether she is a single girl, a man, married or pregnant. Meanings of sleep in a dream If a person sees in his dream that he is sleeping, whether male or female, then he has fallen asleep, this means That the dreamer is ignorant of something that concerns him, or that he has been deceived by it. Whoever sleeps is not weighed down in his sleep by what others say, then he is a little negligent. This is explained by neglect, and this happens in some rare cases when the dreamer goes through a period of deviation from the right path. It may indicate the death of anxiety. Sleeping for an unmarried woman is marriage, and it is said that sleeping is the death of a sin, and fear has safety. Seeing people sleeping can indicate depression and high prices. Whoever dreams of sleeping on his back will be able to live in this world. Sleeping in a dream can symbolize peace of mind, on the other hand. , it can indicate that you are unaware of the events happening around you and beyond your step. Sleeping next to a stranger in a dream means that you are avoiding entering into anything strange in your condition and situation, and it also indicates a refusal to reveal or accept the negative aspects of your personality. Sleep indicates To the end of a stage and you have to start again. Seeing someone else sleeping indicates your inability to find solutions to your situation that may be the cause of your anxiety. If you see yourself sleeping in the street, this may indicate losing a job. Seeing yourself sleeping in the mosque indicates comfort and change in your general life. Sleeping on the floor In a dream, it can indicate poverty. Sleeping next to a dead person in a dream can indicate inheritance. Sleeping in a place not designated for that indicates health problems. Sleeping next to a child in a dream can indicate family happiness. Yawning during sleep symbolizes illness and has a pleasant smell. He adds that it It is beautiful for the one who sees it, or what he knows in a way that he sees as good, but it is not. Yawning in a dream is a sign of negligence, loss, or deception on the part of a person or sect that is being circulated. Waking up from sleep during a dream, the movement of the grandfather, or the seriousness and insistence of the viewer, and the viewer’s desire for actual action. Or fatigue to achieve something he aspires to achieve. This is evidence that he is aware of what is going on around him of machinations, neglect, or deception, and perhaps he is entering a new stage of work, progress, and kindness. Laughing during sleep indicates sadness, according to Ibn Sirin, or indicates exhaustion and life’s difficulties. Or its decline in the eyes of the fortuneteller. A loud sound, a loud scream, or a loud snore in a dream indicates that the dreamer has fallen into evil or heresy or is on his way to it. Sleeping on his back suggests the dispersion of the dreamer, his family, or his home, and suggests humiliation and death, and perhaps remorse, vacation. From work or dismissal. It can indicate comfort and relief from sadness and sorrow. Sleeping on the side is good, the dreamer’s illness or death. Sleeping and lying down under a tree or in its shade or between trees indicates offspring, children, offering from God, and provision. Interpretation of sleep vision - YouTube

title: The 15 most important interpretations of seeing a dream about confusion in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Scientists’ interpretations of the appearance of confusion in a dream: One of the visions that make the dreamer wake up in a state of terror is the vision of confusion, so the dreamer begins to search for an interpretation of this vision to know whether it is good? Or will it be interpreted as something bad coming to the dreamer? Learn about the most important interpretations of confusion in a dream through the following. Interpretation of a dream of confusion If the dreamer dreamed that he was lost in a dream and was walking in the streets without knowing his address, then this dream indicates the dreamer’s excessive thinking about something that occupies his mind a lot, and this matter will lead to confusion for the dreamer. If the dreamer is a student in school and sees that he is lost, this is a good indication that the dreamer will have great knowledge and people will gather around him one day to benefit from his knowledge. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the dream of being lost in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person who lives in life without goals and feels that His future is lost. If a married woman dreams of losing one of her children, this vision confirms the lack of a good relationship between her and her children, and the same interpretation applies to a married man who sees one of his children lost. Him. If the dreamer sees that something he owns has been lost or lost, then this vision confirms a great loss that will befall him and he will suffer from it. If the dreamer is lost in a barren desert, this means that he cannot choose between two things that confused him in reality. If the dreamer dreams that he is lost In the desert and continues to search for a tent to sit in, this means that the dreamer will soon face some obstacles and obstacles. If the dreamer dreams that he is lost in an unknown place and finds that that place is full of poisonous reptiles and spiders such as scorpions and snakes, this means that the dreamer will fall into great evil and be harmed by it. The confusion of an unmarried woman in her dream was not a bad vision as some explain, but it is a sign that she will get married or enter a new life, perhaps a better career than her previous career or graduate from university. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for a dream interpretation website. Egyptian, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation of a dream about getting lost on the road? If a married woman sees that she is missing from her home, this dream means that she is suffering from her husband’s mistreatment of her, which means that he is rude and cruel in his relationship with her, and this What upset her. Whoever dreams that he is lost on the road, the vision shows that he is a moody person. If the dreamer is a young child or a teenage boy and sees that he is lost, then this dream indicates the dreamer’s lack of self-control and affection from his parents. One jurist said that the vision Confusion in the paths means that the dreamer is a confused personality and follows randomness in everything in his life. Interpretation of confusion in the dream: If a pregnant woman is lost in a dream, this indicates the intense anxiety she feels for fear of her suffering during childbirth, but the vision promises the one who saw it that the day of childbirth will be Easy, God willing. If a married woman dreams of being lost inside her home, then this dream is evidence of her silence about the lack of cohesion of her family members and that you

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about giving a dead person money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. It is common among people that a dead person’s gift to a living person indicates many good things, including abundance of sustenance and happiness, and it can also be an indication that the dreamer wants to achieve a goal in his life that he seeks to achieve for a while. Long, and sometimes it can. His real life, and given the interest of many in knowing the interpretations in detail, we have prepared our article for today to present the interpretation of the dream of a dead person giving money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of a dead person giving money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin Our vision of the dead person in a dream makes us anxious and fearful, which prompts us to immediately resort to research. What does this vision mean, as it carries two things that can be bad or good, especially if the dead person gives money to the dead person. The fortune teller, and let us explain this to you in detail: If the money is made of paper, it indicates that he is asking the fortune teller for alms for himself or feeding the poor and the poor. It also indicates the necessity of helping the dead in everything the dreamer can do, whether through prayer, reading the Qur’an, or Zakat for his soul. It may indicate that it is a warning of problems and crises in his life or a sign of distress and sorrow that the god will suffer from. But if the deceased gives the dreamer money and does not take it, this is an indication that good things will come to him in the coming days. If the dreamer is sad, then this An indication that he has gotten rid of the worries and problems that he is suffering from at the present time. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person giving his wife money. This vision indicates many different things that will happen in the life of this future wife, and the interpretations it carries are as follows: It indicates that the virtuous woman misses her husband very much and needs him, and that her situation Financially is very difficult without him and she needs money. But if she sees that her husband gives her money, this is a sign that God will open the doors of livelihood for her that will raise her material and social level. It is an indication that she has a strong personality and the ability to take care of household chores even without her husband. And her vision of her dead husband He gives her a lot of bills during his death, so this is a sign that she will achieve all her big goals. See also: Interpretation of dreams about hair loss in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen, and Fahd Al-Osaimi. Interpretation of a dead person’s dream of giving a pregnant woman money. Commentators and scholars also explained the interpretations that this vision brings to the pregnant woman, and most of them bring goodness. He improves her psychological state that she is currently suffering from, and explains it to you as follows: He gave her coins of a metal type, as this indicates the hardship she may be exposed to at birth. Among the scholars, she saw it as good news that her fetus would be free of diseases. It could be a sign On early labor and the fulfillment of the desires and dreams she wants. However, silver coins in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate that she will give birth to a girl, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. As for gold coins, it indicates that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. If the dreamer is actually sick and sees this vision, this indicates recovery.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about a married woman’s makeup according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman: Makeup is the application of cosmetics to the face in order to beautify the woman and appear beautiful and attractive in front of others. Most of the answers agreed that wearing it for the husband only is not bad, except that wearing it in front of people may be undesirable and it is better to stay away from it. So what about the interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman? ? To answer this question, scholars have proposed many different meanings between good and evil, which we will learn about in detail in this article. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman indicates her interest in appearing before her husband to gain his approval. If a married woman sees herself wearing beautiful makeup in In a dream, you will see positive changes in her life. It is said that applying blush, which is one of the components of makeup, in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good news. Seeing a wife applying kohl in her dream is good news for her husband’s anguish and almost comforts her. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup for a married woman In Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin believes that makeup is a tool for beautifying a woman, and in his interpretation of a dream about makeup for a married woman, there are many different meanings, such as: If a married woman sees that there is makeup on her face, then she wants to correct the mistakes of the past. As for seeing a wife with bad and excessive makeup and her appearance It is inappropriate, as she treats others in an unpleasant manner. Wearing light makeup in a woman’s dream indicates ease and improved standards of living. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup on a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about makeup for a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a beautiful girl. Whereas if a pregnant woman dreams of an unknown woman doing her makeup This may indicate that she is at risk of a serious health problem. Buying and wearing makeup in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news about the arrival of a lot of money and providing livelihood for the newborn. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a pregnant woman wearing dark makeup in a dream can symbolize a feeling of stress. And stress from childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup in front of a mirror for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup in front of a mirror for a pregnant woman may indicate her fear of increasing her body weight after giving birth and the effects of pregnancy. It is said that a pregnant woman’s dream of applying makeup in front of a mirror only indicates concern for outward appearance and self-neglect due to... Pregnancy complications. Applying makeup in front of a mirror in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that she has a male child. Interpretation of a dream about eye makeup for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about applying yellow makeup to a pregnant woman’s eyes can warn her of the deterioration of her health and a feeling of weakness and illness. As for seeing a pregnant woman putting Makeup in light colors on her eyes, as this is a sign of quick and easy delivery. Wearing makeup in a dream is good news for a married woman. When is makeup applied in a dream good news? When a married woman sees wearing eyeliner in her dream, this is evidence of her insight, wisdom, and foresight in matters and taking The right decisions. Make-up in a simple and not intense way

title: Find out the interpretation of my dream that I was getting married in a dream with Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was getting married, seeing a wedding in a dream is one of those dreams in which the dreamer stops and is interested in searching for its interpretations, whether he is a man or a woman. Marriage is the year of life and a door to the arrival of joy, happiness, human life, and the care of offspring to rebuild the earth. So what is the interpretation of my dream that I got married? When we answer this question, we find many different implications from one opinion to another. Seeing a man has connotations that differ from that of a single woman, a married woman, etc., and this is what we will refer to in the lines of this article. I dreamed that I was getting married. The interpretation of my vision of getting married in a dream varies from one person to another, as we see: Marrying a lover in a single woman’s dream is good news when she hears happy news. , as if you are related to the knight of her dreams. I dreamed that I was marrying a pregnant woman, which indicates the birth of a beautiful baby girl. Seeing a man marrying his pregnant wife in a dream means that he will be blessed with a male child. Seeing a divorced woman getting married in her dream and wearing a white wedding dress is a sign of compensation from God and provision from the man. The righteous person compensates her for her previous marriage. As for the marriage of a widow in a dream, it indicates an improvement in her financial living conditions and the ability to raise her children and play the role of father and mother together. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a dead person, then she will become pregnant soon. Jurists hate seeing an unmarried woman marrying an unknown man because he may It portends her death or her travel and movement from one place to another and instability. I dreamed that I was marrying Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of the dream of marriage several desirable connotations, including: Ibn Sirin interprets my vision of marriage as a sign of the arrival of goodness in general. Marriage in a dream indicates protection, health and blessing in life. Money and livelihood. Seeing a man getting married in a dream is a sign of entering into a new business partnership. Whoever sees in his dream that he will attend a wedding, will be promoted at work and will hold an important position. Scientists interpret the dream of marrying a beautiful girl with confusing features in a dream as a sign of majesty And honor and status in the world. I dreamed of marrying a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about marriage for a single woman generally indicates that her marriage is already close. title: Interpretation of a dream about dead people taking money from the living

preview.html: Here we need an interpretation of seeing him in a dream, and we will discover in this article through our translator. Interpretation of seeing the deceased taking money from the living in a dream for an unmarried girl The deceased took money from an unmarried woman in a dream. An indication of the profits that she will get, whether they are substantial. Or morals in her work or life in general. Seeing a dead woman taking money from an unmarried woman expresses the achievement of her goals and aspirations that she seeks to achieve, God willing. But if she sees the deceased giving her money, this is an indication that there is someone in her life who supports her and pushes her forward, progress and development from herself. Seeing a dead person asking for money from an unmarried woman in a dream indicates his need for a lot of begging and charity. The deceased refused in a dream to take money from an unmarried woman. An indication that he does forbidden things and many sins, and he must repent to God and seek forgiveness. See receiving coins from the dead in a single dream. A statement of the problems and difficulties that she faced in her academic or practical life. She must be careful of what is going on around her as there are those who wish her to fail and destroy her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing the dead taking money from the living in a dream for a married womanSeeing the deceased taking money from a married woman in a dream. It announces that he is going through problems and obstacles during this period in which he lives. You will get out of this with minimal losses, God willing. Seeing the dead taking money from a married woman in a dream. It indicates the fulfillment of a large part of the desires and goals that you want to achieve, God willing. This vision indicates that the married woman needs many needs that she cannot express or express. Watching a married woman being given money by her deceased husband in a dream. This indicates that he left her an inheritance so that she does not need it after him. The arrival of a deceased father in a married woman’s dream asking her for money. It indicates her need to pray, donate, or pay off debts. Giving the money of the deceased to a married woman indicates that she will be compensated, God willing. For what he suffered during this period, he lived, endured, and was patient without complaining to anyone. If a married woman sees that she is receiving money from the dead in a dream and suffers from delayed childbearing in reality. This vision is good news for her pregnancy soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the dead taking money from The living in a dream about a man and its meaning: Seeing a man giving the dead silver in a dream. An indication that his wife will give birth to girls, and the offspring will improve with good upbringing and education, God willing. Giving the dead money to a man in a dream is evidence of achieving his goals that he was striving to achieve. And reaching a high position that he wanted in his work. The deceased in a dream took banknotes from a man. An indication of problems. And difficulties that can lead to the loss of important things in his life. A man refused to take money from the dead in a dream, indicating that his situation will not change and will remain with him for a long time. And if one takes money from the dead, this indicates a great deal of livelihood and wealth.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a tall building in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you an interpretation of seeing a tall building in a complete dream, and this vision expresses towers or an energy column. Psychological distress. We have collected for you all the interpretations from translation books and great insights. Here, dear followers, we present to you the interpretation of seeing the Al-Adili Building in a dream for single women, men, and pregnant women. Interpretation of seeing a high-rise building in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Shirin says that the presence of a multi-storey building in a dream can indicate the collapse of her worries and the abundance of happiness. And also, Seeing a high-rise building in a dream can indicate the achievement of many of a woman’s goals and aspirations and it can also indicate many ways of life, and God knows best. Also, seeing a full-length high-rise building in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will join a new job and a large sum of money. Of the money that he will earn in his trade. Interpretation of seeing a tall building in a dream completed for the common woman. If a girl sees the bowl of a high-rise building in her dream, this vision may indicate the achievement of her goals and the arrival of many means of livelihood. Also, seeing a high-rise building in a dream may indicate the collapse Her fears and joining a job and a good job that she has been waiting for a long time to join. Also, seeing a multi-storey building in a dream can indicate excellence and great success in her life, progress, progress, instability and many trips. Seeing a completely high-rise building in a dream could mean marriage An old man who loves her and will suit her well and may also indicate happiness. Interpretation of seeing a tall building in a dream, completed, for a married woman. If a married woman sees a tall tower or a building in her dream, this indicates the end of her worries and the achievement of her many goals and ambitions. Also, seeing a tall building in a dream, completed, is for a married woman It may indicate her proximity to pregnancy and the collapse of the disputes that arise between her and her husband. Seeing a high-rise building in a dream may mean that her children will join the best education and her husband will join a large and prestigious job, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a high-rise building in a dream completed for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees In a complete dream that she saw a tall and large building, this indicates the end of her worries and the arrival of abundant livelihood, and God knows best. Also, seeing a completed multi-storey building in a dream may indicate the ease of her affairs and the ease of giving birth to a new baby who is healthy and free of all diseases. Interpretation of seeing a building A high-rise in a complete dream for a manSeeing a handsome man in a dream complete and seeing a high-rise building in a completed dream indicates the arrival of happiness and progress to the highest levels. Also, seeing a high-rise building in a single man’s dream may indicate his close marriage to a good and pious girl who believes in Almighty God. Also, seeing a complete high-rise building in a dream may indicate the collapse of marital disputes, the arrival of many means of livelihood, and the dreamer’s entry into a new and prestigious job. Seeing a high-rise building in a completed dream for a married man may indicate the collapse of his disputes that are occurring, as well as the death of many.

title: Learn more about the appearance of curtains in a dream

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream: Curtains in a dream can carry many interpretations, whether they dream of goodness or carry the meaning of the presence of an illness for the dreamer, whether they indicate the dreamer’s worries or his distance from his Lord. These interpretations differ according to the dreamer, and according to the situation in which he If a person sees in a dream that he has a bright red curtain in front of him, then this vision indicates that the dreamer lives in a good, cohesive emotional relationship and there is a lot of mutual love between him and the other, and this may be the case. Also explain that this person has made a decision to marry the girl who has this much love. If one sees in a dream that in front of him is a set of curtains bearing many attractive inscriptions and decorations, then this vision indicates the very good financial condition in which the dreamer will find himself As for the person who dreams that he is in front of his house or the house of one of his friends, and that the entire house is covered with curtains and does not reveal what is inside that house, this vision is evidence that the person with this vision is always trying to preserve the privacy of the person who lives in the house covered with curtains in the dream. Location. Al-Masry is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Blue Curtains Dream InterpretationIf a married, pregnant, widowed, or divorced woman dreams that she sees a curtain falling on the windows of her house and that it is blue in color An attractive light, this vision indicates that this woman will have a wonderful and distinguished future full of happiness and satisfaction. What is the interpretation of a dream about white curtains? If a person sees in a dream that he is putting up a curtain in the house, and it is an attractive bright white color, then this vision indicates The dreamer has a distinguished family and will be happy with a married life full of bliss, interconnectedness and mutuality. Love between them. If an unmarried girl sees the curtains in a dream in white, this is evidence that this girl’s life will be in a better position than it is now, and it also shows that her future life will be completely free of obstacles and problems. It can stain them. Interpretation of a dream about curtains: If an unmarried girl sees curtains in a dream and puts up a set of these curtains, this means that this girl will soon propose to someone to propose to her and marry her. As for the person who sees curtains in a dream in general, the evidence for this vision is in The dream is the concealment and ability of this person to cover others and hide his secret from others. When a person dreams of the same vision as before, this vision is evidence that the dreamer will be blessed by God with much goodness, blessings, and abundant livelihood, which will be the reason for the dreamer’s life to turn into something better than this. . What is the interpretation of a dream about hanging curtains? If a married woman sees herself putting up a set of curtains for the house, then this vision indicates that this woman will enjoy a calm and stable future full of happiness and pure love.
